entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Net.Mail.Functional.Tests work item failures #75378
  • LibraryImport fails to Marshal ByValTStr (SYSLIB1051) #75376
  • Unable to run any Libraries tests on Ubuntu 22.04 ARM64 #75374
  • Autogenerate mobile app LocalBuild.props file #75370
  • [API Proposal]: Type.HasDefaultConstructor method #75362
  • Tar: ustar entries with long name unable to roundtrip #75360
    8.0.0
  • VectorConvert_r_Target_64Bit and VectorConvert_ro_Target_64Bit fail with LLVM 14 #75359
    8.0.0
  • System.Reflection work planned for .NET 8 #75358
    8.0.0
  • Change IL Emit invoke path to use function pointers and OpCodes.Calli #75357
    8.0.0
  • Unable to run WebAssembly Browser App from VS or CLI #75356
    7.0.0
  • SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose failed with ObjectDisposedException #75354
  • [API Proposal]: Determining the http protocol version chosen by ClientWebSocket #75353
  • [API Proposal]: byref parameter collection for invoke #75349
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IL Emit support for FunctionPointer #75348
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Reflection invoke support for FunctionPointer #75347
    8.0.0
  • Native file reference freezing Blazor WASM build indefinitely #75345
  • QuicListener will not throw when listening on IPv6 address on systems with disabled IPv6 #75343
  • [mono] iOS HelloWorld sample build configuration does not use same size optimizations as MAUI #75337
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Better communication between apphost and browser #75335
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Benchstones\\BenchI\\Fib\\Fib\\Fib.cmd #75325
  • Error hot reloading new method in Blazor WebAssembly app #75324
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.Replace(Span<T>, T, T) #75322
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: SplitFirst/SplitLast convenience methods for strings and Span/Memory<char> slices #75317
  • Memory leaking with Serializing JSON on Large Objects #75314

Closed

  • Crossgen2 crashes intermittently on Windows ARM64 #71702
    7.0.0
  • COSE needs to enforce that only NIST P-{256,384,521} are used #74684
    7.0.0
  • Enum Improvements #20008
    Future
  • Add flag Enum methods #28199
    Future
  • Add new ObsoleteAttribute constructor to accelerate forwarding to a different type. #28753
    Future
  • Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable on Windows #75031
  • Suggestion/Question - Why is there no string type that enforces non-null, non-empty, non-whitespace strings? #30624
    Future
  • API proposal: string.SubstringUntil/string.SubstringAfter #661
    Future
  • CI failure: Native mono arm64 crash in System.Net.Requests.Tests #75368
  • Android AOT+LLVM `InvalidOperation_EnumEnded` #73304
    7.0.0
  • JIT: perf regression from improved local struct copy prop #75229
    8.0.0
  • Binary Xml format broken on big-endian machines #74494
    7.0.0
  • UnobservedTaskException's from ReadAheadWithZeroByteReadAsync #75355
  • [API Proposal]: IEnumerable<T> Default Implementation for IEnumerable #75351
  • Initial version for resolver for supporting DataContract and DataMember attributes in System.Text.Json #75226
  • `Console.ReadKey` behaves differently in .NET 6 and .NET 7-preview.7 comparing to .NET 5 when TERM is set to rxvt #75289
    7.0.0
  • The type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.EntityQueryable`1[xxx]' can only be serialized using async serialization methods. Path: $. #75327
  • Edge-case race condition in WebProxy #75134
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.GetProcessesByName_ProcessName_ReturnsExpected [FAIL] #75329
  • System.InvalidOperationException: 'overlapped' has already been freed. at System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandleOverlapped.CompletionCallback(UInt32 , UInt32 , NativeOverlapped* ) at System.Threading._IOCompletionCallback.PerformIOCompletionCallback(UInt32 , UInt32 , NativeOverlapped* ) #72644
    Future
  • [release/6.0] Add Rocky Linux RIDs #74159
    6.0.x
  • CI failure in OSX x64 release NativeAOT SmokeTests SharedLibrary.sh #75005
    8.0.0
  • Bionic Android Mono CI failure in System.IO.Pipes named pipes unix domain socket tests (server and client) #75021

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix IPv6 detection in QUIC tests #75382
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [NOREVIEW] Stress quic loading/unloading #75381
    area-System.Net
  • update helix queues to pick up MsQuic 2.1.1 #75380
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Some feedback for 8.0 after doing PR on #75366 for 7.0-rc2. #75379
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable on Windows (#75176) #75377
    area-System.Transactions
  • JIT: block copy/zero assertion gen for structs with exposed promoted … #75375
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix prefix writing on TarHeaderWrite #75373
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0][wasm][host] Track change in forwardConsole parameter to forwardConso… #75372
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add RIDs for macOS 13 #75371
    community-contribution
  • Change VerifyXmlResolver to use TcpListener over HttpListener #75369
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix test issues on armv6, ppc64le on runtime-community #75367
    area-Meta, arch-s390x, arch-ppc64le
  • Manually backporting #74599 to 7.0 for RC2. #75366
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • Pad the perm table to avoid array out of bound #75364
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix WebSockets.Client.ConnectTest crash for apple mobile platforms #75344
    area-System.Net
  • Missed full type initialization #75340
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Including ILStrip build task when building iOS sample app in fullAOT mode #75339
    area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • JIT: Quiet NaNs on x86 hosts #75338
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/macOS] Link to libSystem.Security.Cryptography.Native.OpenSsl on macOS #75333
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing fix for workloads on main #75331
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Do not emit mangled names in mstat files #75328
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use LastIndexOf{Any} in Path.GetFileName #75318
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Enable gsharedvt by default as an experiment. #75315
    NO-MERGE

Merged

  • Reuse more Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration code in JS generators #74949
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator
  • Delete `lvPromotedStruct` #74702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Skip Quic IPv6 tests on unsupported platforms #75341
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable on Windows #75176
    area-System.Transactions
  • Fix prefix writing on TarHeaderWrite #75350
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Fix test issues on armv6, s390x and ppc64le on runtime-community #75282
  • Fix XmlBinaryReader/XmlBinaryWriter on big-endian systems #74599
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • JIT: propagate some block assertions after expansion #75321
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/macOS] Allow lldb to skip over null reference exceptions #75332
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Test, and app host fixes #75295
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] add ability to set GCName via runtimeconfig. #75159
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make CredScan happy with UriBuilder tests #75352
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder: Fix complex types in constructors #74981
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix GCEvent::Wait with timeout on OSX #75316
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix VS component versions #74324
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.x
  • update msquic to 2.1.1 #75287
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Remove Browser implementation of PBKDF2 one-shot. #75283
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • try to port ASCIIUtility.WidenAsciiToUtf16 to x-plat intrinsics #73055
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 8.0.0
  • Use HashCode.AddBytes in CodeHeaderValue.GetHashCode #75320
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Fix typo in System.Reflection.Metadata Strings.resx #75336
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Use PopCount instead of loop for X.509 chain status #75277
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Simplify AsnDecoder.ReverseBitsPerByte #75301
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Remove enumerator allocation when constructing RestrictedAsciiStringEncoding #75303
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • Use IndexOf in NamespaceCache.SynthesizeNamespaceData #75319
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Use IndexOf in Uri.GetLocalPath #75323
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Race in init_method when using LLVM AOT. #75088
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Do no test StartTime in GetProcessesByName test #75334
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add Vector128 SQRT intrinsics for amd64 #74865
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • update Debian Helix images to msquic 2.1.1 #75291
    test-enhancement, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix RegexOptions.NonBacktracking matching end anchors at timeout check boundaries #75308
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0] Fix `Exp10M1(TSelf)` and `Round(TSelf, MidpointRounding)` #75284
    area-System.Numerics
  • disable gcmemoryinfo on win-arm64 #75309
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix WebProxy Race Condition Issue #75246
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Fix GCEvent::Wait with timeout on OSX #75298
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Supply official build id to inner-source build command #75293
  • [workloads] Add new workloads for net8.0 #75200
    area-Build-mono
  • Make RegisterChangeCallback consistent with CancellationChangeToken #75158
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Adjust the lpParent of "adopted" child loops #75218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [Release/7.0] Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #74822
    area-Meta
  • Test instrumentation #74959
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Target only net7.0 during source-build #75168
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Initial osx-arm64 bring up #75264
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [Android][libs] Introduce DateTimeOffset.Now temporary fast result #74965
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Fix slow perf for serializing large payloads and add test #75147
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #75311
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Prevent exception when attempting to write PaxTarEntry obtained from TarReader #75237
    area-System.IO
  • Publish assets immediately and clean some vars #75222
  • JIT: run local struct to field update in morph both pre and post order for returns #75304
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] [mono][llvm] Disable simd intrinsics when we might be interoping between jit and llvmaot #75261
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Simplify some `ADDR`-related code; fix one bug #74274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete `(unsigned)CHECK_SPILL_ALL|NONE` casts #72889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Try moving mobile tests into their own pipelines. #75213
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Negate and OnesComplement intrinsics for amd64 #74993
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix firefox flaky tests on CI. #75090
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Sum intrinsic for amd64 #75142
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions and block ARM #74570
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add EqualityComparer<T>.Create #75212
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • remove Centos 8 from Helix as it is EOL #75299
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions and block ARM #74226
    area-System.Transactions, 8.0.0
  • Avoid unnecessary overflow check during div/mod on Arm64 (#46010) #75272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Disable and fix remaining failing tests on Browser with multi-threading and perf tracing enabled #75286
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Unit test running two instances of .NET #75181
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] add git hash to dotnet.js and print it from unit tests #75279
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Resolve tvOS/iOS FileSystem test failures #74927
    area-System.IO
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Skip redundant hwintrinsic float movs (#58954) #75202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Update provider_compute_event_enable_mask so EventSouces with no keywords show up by default #75248
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Simplify windows version detection in vm #75254
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via crossgen2 #75230
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • cli: dotnet --latest #27801
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.BlazorWebAssembly.Tests crashed on Darwin CI leg #27782

Closed

  • questionable file name assumptions baked into SDK #26837

PullRequests

Created

  • Mysterious PR you should ignore for now #27798
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Produce a warning and ignore Prefer32Bit for netcoreapp #27796
  • changed list command example #27795
    area: dotnet new
  • [release/7.0.1xx] In build sign enable #27794
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1988863 #27789
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27784
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Don't read from suppression file it doesn't exist. #27757
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Fix single assembly mode when invoking ApiComparer #27760
    Area-ApiCompat
  • removed extra EnableAnalyzers props #27740
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Produce a warning and ignore Prefer32Bit for netcoreapp #27776
  • Don't use Linq in TypeMustExistTest #27759
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Fix CLI option name #27758
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Lead to `dotnet new create <template name>` #27593
  • Remove custom logic of fetching dotnet dir #26851
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ownership of dotnet watch #26669
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 8.0 alpha branding #27189
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove timeout, reenable ProjectReferences_Graph test #27657
    Area-Watch
  • Sdk location #27748
  • Use redist SDK deployment in watch tests #27775
  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx

Updated

  • Add output DebugSymbolsFiles to ResolvePackageAssets #27580
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Target net7.0 in additional projects #27012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1988911 #27667
  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implements standard dotnet options for controlling output in dotnet new #27628
    area: dotnet new
  • Revert "do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type" #27774
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27746
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT variable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge resolver retargeting to rc2 #27777
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27773
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.402

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure Local Constant Usage is Tracked in Local function and Lambda Parameter Attributes #63911
  • Add `SymbolDisplayFormat.CSharpText` #63906
    C# 12.0
  • Allow [module: RefSafetyRules] attribute in source #63904
  • Test comment references wrong compiler error code #63898
  • Implement ref safety analysis as a BoundNodeVisitor #63897
  • Avoid binding lambda expressions unnecessarily in error scenarios #63896
  • Code cleanup is missing option to remove empty lines #63895
  • IDE Usage Analysis Does Not Account for Lambda Default Parameters #63892
  • Source generators have exploded the costs of making skeleton references. #63891
  • Default Parameter Values Not Supported By QuickInfo for Anonymous Delegate Types #63890
    17.5
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63888
    17.4
  • Project.CompilationOutputInfo doesn't resolve a situation with Directory.Build.props case #63886
    Backlog
  • `langword` value is not colorized correctly in doc comments #63885
    Backlog
  • Generate Method generates doubly nullable struct types when used with null coalescing operator #63883
  • Create a table to store data so we can track the average number of yellow bars a user sees in a release #63881

Closed

  • Low level struct improvements allow returning references to a current method's stack #62850
    17.4
  • Feature request: Add generators execution times to `/reportanalyzer` #63887
  • Find References additional filter options #63875

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace Razor Source Generator reference with one loaded from a VSIX #63912
    Area-IDE
  • Add feature flag #63910
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Additional Test Coverage For Lambda Default Parameters #63909
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve readability of EnC log in memory dumps #63908
    Area-Interactive
  • Disable quickinfo on new inline rename #63907
    Area-IDE
  • Update vs-extension-testing to 0.1.145-beta #63903
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move 'Todo Comments' to EA pattern (redux) #63902
    Area-IDE
  • fixed a comment to clarify correct error code in the test. fixes #63898 #63901
    Area-Compilers, Test, Community
  • Colorize langword inside doc comments #63900
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use common pattern for traits in tests #63893
    Area-IDE
  • Fix type inference in coalesce expression #63884
    Area-IDE
  • Compiler outputs #63882
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63880
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1987893 #63879

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63905
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix integration tests by not listening to value changed for old UI #63865
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Move 'Todo Comments' to EA pattern" #63889
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • When shrinking breakpoints down to less lines, stick to the end of the range #63731
    Area-IDE
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • Update DefiniteAssignment Pass to Account for Local Default Parameter Values #63850
    Area-Compilers
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Non positional option for Convert To Record #63848
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Propagate In/Out attributes on local functions #63824
    Area-Compilers
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Use frozen partial semantic for import completion in OOP #63862
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixes implementation of With methods of recoverable trees #63876
    Area-IDE
  • Some improvements to Workspace.CanApplyChanges #63701
    Area-IDE
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Unify handling of directive parsing accross multiple code paths #63832
    Area-Compilers
  • Guard against a regular stack overflow exception in ControlFlowGraphBuilder. #63854
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation
  • Enforce SetsRequiredMembers nullability on implicit chained constructors #63790
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add support for Suppression/Configuration fixes for build-only diagno… #63835
    Area-IDE
  • Check method arguments must match for property accessors #63809
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Do not go back from Solution snapshot to Workspace in Metadata-as-Source #63869
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for delete parameter intent #63546
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using the System.Text.Json source generator with ASP NET Core throws NotSupportedException when attempting to serialize IEnumerable<T> #43894
  • Generic Layout Attribute #43893
  • Add NoVaryByHost to Output Caching #43891
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #43890
  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #43889
  • "IISExpress LaunchUrl" is not working #43886
  • Data Annotations Localization does not inherits the resource from base class #43885
  • ComponentBase.BuildRenderTree cannot be overriden #43883
  • asp-append-version does not work with asp-src-include if globbing is used and file paths contain whitespace. #43878
  • NavigationManager extensions: NavigateToLogin API remarks #43876
    7.0.0
  • upstream connect error or disconnect/reset before headers. reset reason: protocol error #43874
  • Viewing the entire list of registered middleware for the ASP.NET pipeline #43871
  • Opting out of Developer exception page during development #43870
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor WebAssembly empty template minor issues #43869
    7.0-rc2
  • Blazor Hybrid - Performance UpdateDisplayAsync #43867
  • Better diagnostics/information for circular DI dependencies in Blazor WebAssembly #43866
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, fortunes_dapper #43864
  • Better logs for not succeeded policy authentication schemes #43861
    8.0-preview1
  • Pass unmatched attributes (splat) in `<ValidationSummary />` #43860
  • Application parts manager can't ingest hubs #43859
  • Svg Bug On Blazor With Rectangles #43858

Closed

  • CookieOptions - Domain property not leading to expected behavior #43579
  • Custom SignInManager #43626
  • Update Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer dependencies (Duende.IdentityServer) #41315
    7.0-rc2
  • Rate Limiting for Yarp implementations #37387
    7.0-rc2
  • IHostingEnvironment.WebRootPath is not nullable but can be null #41929
    7.0-rc2
  • API Review for System.Web adapters (Part 1): HttpContext #42090
    7.0-rc2
  • Use custom binary serialization for output cache entries #43415
    7.0-rc2
  • Security team claims .NET 6 deleted app pools in IIS #43819
  • Improve OutputCaching vary-by API #43355
    7.0-rc2
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix #43863
  • Build the SharedFx installer for Win-arm64 #38530
    6.0.x
  • Unable to uninstall .NET Core 2.1.30 Hosting Bundle #40955
  • Deployments Destroy All Circuits #43873
  • Make ReactDevelopmentServerMiddleware a more general-purpose middleware #43826
  • How to User Razor in a winform applications #43856
  • HAML support #43823
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #43821
  • Flaky test: ProjectReferences_Graph #29213
    .NET 8 Planning
  • after parse http2 stream, how to reset #43813

PullRequests

Created

  • Add NoVaryByHost policy #43892
    area-runtime
  • [Backport] [SignalR] Avoid unobserved tasks in the .NET client #43882
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, signalr-client-net, 6.0.x
  • Better logs in AuthorizationMiddleware #43862
    area-security, community-contribution

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SqlException: EFCore thinks I am trying to identity insert when I never manually set the primary key. #29040
  • Query: Inconsistency in reverse owned navigations handling #29039
  • Query: Generate inner join for required dependent if owner is not left joined #29038
  • Fix test namespaces #29037
  • Refactor ShadowEntityTypeTest #29036
  • Introduce aggregating TableExpression as implementation detail for multi-table mappings #29035
  • EFCore's error handling is useless and leads to loss of productivity and frustration! #29034
  • Union not supported? #29027

Closed

  • Query: ExecuteDelete on entity type owning other entities do not work #28573
    Backlog
  • ExecuteDelete for owner when only its owned types are sharing the same table #28671
    7.0.0
  • `dotnet-ef database update` fails with PlatformNotSupported on Fedora Linux #28786
  • ObjectDisposedException when DbContext.ChangeTracker is accessed immediately after the DbContext construction. #28935
  • Temporal tables are not supported for table splitting but no table splitting is used #28931
  • How to use a custom function in the extended function "Select" of IQueryable #28914
  • CosmosDB: Nested embedded entities get rearranged on deletion #27272
    7.0.0
  • (Cosmos) Embedded entities (OwnsMany) throws an InvalidOperationException when calling SaveChangesAsync #24828
    7.0.0
  • Changes in parent owned collection cause unexpected behavior in nested owned collection #27918
    7.0.0
  • Reformat code #28964
    7.0.0-rc2
  • Support sproc input/output parameters on non-concurrency-token properties #28704
    7.0.0-rc2
  • ChangeTracker.DetectChanges() issue with DDD-style enumerations #29008

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip Component Governance in public builds #29033
  • Allow FK type in database to be different from PK type #29026

Merged

  • ExecuteDelete for aggregate root when only owned types are sharing th… #29023
  • Don't undelete dependents if principal key changes #29028
  • Code cleanup--tests #29030
  • TPH sibling metadata bug #29025
  • Publish assets immediately #29022
  • Code cleanup #29012
  • Support sproc input/output parameters on non-concurrency-token properties #28908

Updated

  • SQL parentheses work #27177
